name: Reboot Resume Restore
description:
REBOOT RESUME RESTORE

A short puzzle platformer (10 levels).
Created for Newgrounds and Haxeflixel Game Jam.
Theme: Alone, Together.
Recommend using Chrome browser to play the game.

 

Controls

Arrow keys, or W, A, D.
Space also works for jump.
Partial controller support.
Left stick or D-pad to move, bottom face button to jump.

 

Notes

Lag/Slowdown issues?
Use the Effects button on start screen or options menu to toggle effects OFF.
This should remove player trail and glitch effects.
It will also set the draw rate to hopefully a consistent 30 FPS.

 

Credits

Music: The Cynic Project
Sound: Michel Baradari
